title: Samurai 7
synopsis: In the far distant future, on a planet that might have been called "earth", there was a war between samurai who mechanized their bodies. After the long war, people enjoyed a modest peace.
voices: ['Miki, Shinichiro', 'Kong, Kuwata', 'Inukai, Junji', 'Terasoma, Masaki', 'Park, Romi', 'Orikasa, Fumiko', 'Inada, Tetsu', 'Saitou, Chiwa', 'Kusano, Tooru', 'Saizen, Tadahisa']
staff: [['Watson, Barry', ['Producer']], ['Takizawa, Toshifumi', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Tsuruoka, Youta', ['Sound Director']], ['Tada, Shunsuke', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']]]
